name: Armchair Onslaught (VR)
description:
Built as part of the Extra Credits game jam with the theme of "Awesome Per Second" Armchair Onslaught provides a constant challenge, testing your reflexes and weapon management skills. Plenty of programmer art to be seen as the game was built solo in only 48 hours as mt first delve into creating VR experiences. 

If you play it please leave me some feedback in the comments as I'd love the chance to grow myself and improve my design skills!
